headline: Diamondback Unlocks Over $1 Billion From Deep Blue Deal And EPIC Crude Divestiture
summary: Diamondback Energy Inc. (NASDAQ:FANG) will sell its Environmental Disposal Systems LLC unit to Deep Blue Midland Basin LLC in a $750 million deal that expands Deep Blue’s water infrastructure footprint across West Texas. The agreement, announced with partner Five Point Infrastructure LLC, secures Diamondback’s 15-year commitment to produce and supply water services across 12 counties. Diamondback will keep a 30% stake in Deep Blue and receive about $675 million in upfront cash, with the potentia

headline: Diamondback Energy, Inc. Announces the Sale of Its Equity Interest in Epic Crude Holdings, LP

headline: Diamondback Sells Midland Water System to Deep Blue for $675MM
summary: With the dropdown of Diamondback Energy’s midstream water assets—and a sale of its stake in the EPIC crude pipeline—the Permian E&P has hit its targeted divestiture goal of $1.5 billion.

raw.headline: Diamondback Sells Midland Water System to Deep Blue for $675MM
raw.summary: With the dropdown of Diamondback Energy’s midstream water assets—and a sale of its stake in the EPIC crude pipeline—the Permian E&P has hit its targeted divestiture goal of $1.5 billion.

headline: Why China's Oil Production Keeps Growing Despite Lower Oil Prices
summary: Despite lower prices, China has lifted oil output by mobilizing its 2019–2025 Seven-Year Plan—backed by tax breaks and import-equipment waivers—to prioritize energy security and rebuild reserves.

raw.headline: Why China's Oil Production Keeps Growing Despite Lower Oil Prices
raw.summary: Despite lower prices, China has lifted oil output by mobilizing its 2019–2025 Seven-Year Plan—backed by tax breaks and import-equipment waivers—to prioritize energy security and rebuild reserves.
